headline: KKR & Co. Inc. Reports Second Quarter 2025 Results
summary: NEW YORK, July 31, 2025--KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE: KKR) today reported its second quarter 2025 results, which have been posted to the Investor Center section of KKR’s website at https://ir.kkr.com/events-presentations/.
